title: Figure, "Farmer with Wheat Sheafs", ca. 1930
markings: underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange; 1795 impressed in clay.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man dressed in peasant outfit, standing, holding sheaf of wheat in left hand over shoulder and another in right hand resting on ground; he looks slightly to his right; stands on circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Farmer with Wheat Sheafs", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Porcelain (bisque), enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-159.
